name: Distorted reflection
description: This pice is part of a series of 20 surreal generative artworks of abstract pointillism aiming to reflect the surreal visuals of a dreamlike hallucinatory state of mind where the distinction between reality and dreams is blurred (a.k.a. Oneirophrenia). Charcteristics: 4620 x 3170 pixels at 320 DPI.
